dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper introduces the concept of an online medical diagnosis system for ubiquitous health care using a wireless ECG sensor To confirm the feasibility ofthe system we conducted clinical tests by 67 subjects with a wireless ECG sensor and a Holter ECG monitor simultaneously for comparison purpose We made five types of evaluations such as analyses on data loss rate burst data loss length ECG waveforms comparison normalized cross correlation and heart rate variability HRV by RR50 The results show that as long as the sensed data are successfully received at a receiver the wireless ECG sensor has a comparable performance with the Holter ECG monitor
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Clinical tests and evaluations of a wireless ECG sensor for realization of ubiquitous health care systems.
